name: Mars & Rober vs The World
description:
Robby & Mars managed to escape from the factory where they were held captive to work but they might need to make a run for it! 

You can play in the browser and if it does not work properly you can also download the windows executable. The game supports keyboard and joystick controls (we do recommend joystick if possible)

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 edition. The theme being joined together we decided to give the player a companion who keeps him alive while running away!

Don't forget to rate the game!! And thanks for playing :)
